trans-unit.source:
\n

Changes that might occur to a file or directory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The creation, deletion, change, or renaming of a file or folder.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The change of a file or folder.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The types of changes include: changes to size, attributes, security settings, last write, and last access time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx xx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The creation of a file or folder.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The deletion of a file or folder.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The renaming of a file or folder.

\n
